description: Goodwill purchases, already less expensive than many other stores, are going to be extra low for teachers this week.
title: Teachers get a discount at Goodwill stores in metro Atlanta this week
title_page: Teachers get a discount at Goodwill stores in metro Atlanta this week
text:
Goodwill purchases, already less expensive than many other stores, are going to be extra low for teachers this week.
As part of the Goodwill Teacher Appreciation Week, teachers who shop at any Goodwill of North Georgia location through Sunday will receive 25 percent off their purchase. They just need to show a valid educator ID.

READ | APS to get new kindergarten center, separate charter school this year
See below for six metro Atlanta locations, and check here for more stores:
• 888 Ralph David Abernathy Blvd.; 404-755-6440; Hours and directions
• 1460 Northside Drive; 404-367-0077; Hours and directions
• 2135 Piedmont Road; 678-791-1107; Hours and directions
• 4822 Flat Shoals Parkway; 404-917-1685; Hours and directions
• 2201 Lawrenceville Highway; Hours and directions
• 3337 Buford Highway; 678-891-0100; Hours and directions
